subject: Football
Cheating
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. said on Friday that it had interviewed nearly 40 people and hired a firm with forensic expertise to determine if the underinflated footballs used during the A.F.C. championship game were a result of deliberate action.
snippet: The N.F.L. said on Friday that it had interviewed nearly 40 people and hired a firm with forensic expertise to determine if the underinflated footballs used during the A.F.C. championship game were a result of deliberate action.
